entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
